Author: Elmis#0347
Content: Maybe it's something similar to what happened to me, I had 26000 kmd in a native wallet and the airdrop has sent the zillas to an address that is supposedly mine but which I do not have access from my native wallet so strangely the zillas are out of my possibilities of using them, for me they have been lost. It's hard to understand but it's reality. If you @SHossain kows the way to find they, please tell me haw

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: what is the address?

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: @Elmis ^^

Author: Elmis#0347
Content: my kmd address is     RA9G36WwA9K95bn8Cbycq5ZnoxhSzzhhBw and  te airdrop send the zillas to RAceRPKD5ySpUmy9Lwp4cKRiP8JA8uiK8N that is an address I cant see in my wallet

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: You have the private key for that address in native mode already, you can export it and use it in Zilla on native mode or even just using that same private key as a seed in lite mode

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: next to the public address select export Wif  keys and with this private key you can have access to your funds by importing them into native or using that same WIF as a seed in lite mode with Zilla

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: @Elmis you had 26k KMD in this address RAceRPKD5ySpUmy9Lwp4cKRiP8JA8uiK8N until August 23 https://kmdexplorer.io/tx/d00eec91fa1737a67b1832517f442672739d2295f37f5d7b5d46c4c5b99a4fc5

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: you can find the address in your native wallet, get the privkey of `RAceRPKD5ySpUmy9Lwp4cKRiP8JA8uiK8N` and import privkey key in ZILLA native mode or login with the privkey into Lite mode. and, you will have access to your ZILLA funds.

Author: Elmis#0347
Content: My address is RA9G36WwA9K95bn8Cbycq5ZnoxhSzzhhBw and when I use the private key to open agama lite I have my agama wallet with my kmd and when I open Zilla the zilla address is also RA9G36WwA9K95bn8Cbycq5ZnoxhSzzhhBw and the balance is 0.

Author: Elmis#0347
Content: I cant fund the address  RAceRPKD5ySpUmy9Lwp4cKRiP8JA8uiK8N in my wallet using native or lite

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: If I recall correctly the Zilla  snapshot for the airdrop was on the 15 th so your Zilla should be in this address  as seen in this explorer https://zillaexplorer.io/address/RAceRPKD5ySpUmy9Lwp4cKRiP8JA8uiK8N You can do a rescan to see  this pub key in your wallet and finish the process described above with just selecting the export WIF option as showed in this guide . https://komodoplatform.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KPSD/pages/1179728/Rescan+Wallet+with+Agama ,    But also a fastest way to get this private key for the address would be using this methods as showed below. Go to settings and select wallet.dat keys then select KMD and put your pub key RAceRPKD5ySpUmy9Lwp4cKRiP8JA8uiK8N  and select Get Keys or go to CLI select KMD and do this command dumpprivkey RAceRPKD5ySpUmy9Lwp4cKRiP8JA8uiK8N and you should be able to get the priv keys and manage your funds.
